Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Im5 (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals, UCLL1a; more AMPs?)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals 76% similar to AP2172. Mol Wt: 2805.436; Mol formula: C134H222N34O31; GRAVY: 0.332; WWWRH: 0.06.Structure: helical in 50% TFE.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 10 uM), S. aureus (MIC 2.5-5 uM), B. subtilis (MIC 0.5-1 uM); A. baumannii (MIC 0.9 uM; 2.5 ug/ml). Only Im-5 showed insecticidal activity among three peptides (cell death: 45.8% at 100 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Miyashita M, Kitanaka A, Yakio M, Yamazaki Y, Nakagawa Y, Miyagawa H. 2017
Literature Information.Title: Complete de novo sequencing of antimicrobial peptides in the venom of the scorpion Isometrus maculatus
